data.eml:eml: New species of Histiotus (Chiroptera: Vespertilionidae) from northeastern Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Feijó, Anderson, Rocha, Patrício Adriano Da, Althoff, Sergio Luiz (2015): New species of Histiotus (Chiroptera: Vespertilionidae) from northeastern Brazil. Zootaxa 4048 (3): 412-427, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4048.3.4
